channel.title: How do i make untradeble npcs tradeble?
channel.description:
how can i make npcs that do not have the trade option , still be able to trade? im using testscape
example: if i wanted a ghost to be tradeble .. is it possible for me to click the attack option and instead of attacking it a shop pops up?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 12:16:02 AM[/size][hr]any1 know?

item.title: How do i make untradeble npcs tradeble?
item.dc:creator: @killa12345 killa12345
item.description:
@killa12345 wrote:

lol idk but on some servers i see that u can trade santa buy clicking talk [br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 12:39:39 AM[/size][hr]=(

item.title: How do i make untradeble npcs tradeble?

item.description:
@skullsy wrote:

hmm… i dont think you can. How about just getting a ghost that already trades? Like the ghost shopkeeper?
